participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Determined and confident, loves to challenge herself and enjoys being active.
participant_1.background: I go for a long run to relieve stress and clear my head. I love cold weather. I am a karate black belt. I am so proud of myself for overcoming my fear of singing in front of people. My twin brother and I share an apartment.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and friendly, enjoys the little things in life and values companionship.
participant_2.background: I'm not that close to my family, but I do try to keep in touch. I like to bowl. I want to be a journalist but instead I sell washers at Sears. I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings. I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend and always accompanies me on my mountain bike rides.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. What's your name?
Hi participant_2, my name is participant_2.
Nice to meet you, participant_1.
Nice to meet you too, participant_2.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to bowl, grow my own potatoes, and experiment with new seasonings.
That's cool. I like to go for a long run to relieve stress and clear my head.
I used to run a lot, but I don't have the time anymore.
What do you do for work?
I sell washers at Sears, but I want to be a journalist.
That's interesting. What kind of journalism do you want to do?
I want to write about local news and politics.
That would be a great job. I'm sure you'll make a great journalist.
Thanks participant_2. I appreciate that.
No problem. So, tell me more about your dog.
His name is Buddy and he's a Golden Retriever. He's the best dog in the world.
I love Golden Retrievers. They're such sweet dogs.
They are. Buddy is always happy to see me and he loves to play.
I'm sure he's a great companion.
He is. I'm so glad I have him.
